{{codepointer|Classic attack}}'''A_SPosAttackUseAtkSound'''
(no parameters)
A variant of [[A_SPosAttack]] which uses the [[Actor properties#Sound|attack sound]] of the actor instead of the hard coded "shotguy/attack".
== Examples == Code taken from the {{class|SpiderMastermind|Spider Mastermind}}: Missile: SPID A 20 Bright A_FaceTarget SPID G 4 Bright A_SPosAttackUseAtkSound SPID H 4 Bright A_SPosAttackUseAtkSound SPID H 1 Bright A_SpidRefire Goto Missile+1
